content: API CONTRACT: Six operations. WRITE(content, content_type, topic?, references?) -> entry_id + integration_cost. REVISE(entry_id, new_content, reason?) -> revision_id + integration_cost. READ(entry_id, revision?) -> content + metadata. BROWSE(query?, scope?) -> catalog with cumulative_cost and stability. SHARE(notebook, entity, permissions) -> access_token. OBSERVE(since_causal_position?) -> changes with integration_cost + notebook_entropy. READ and SHARE produce no entropy.
author: founder
